definition: description of the accused (position rank, title, role, etc)
Was the accused a state agent or opposed to the government? (current refers to within the last year of the last trials coded)
state membership: in what capacity did the state agent act?
Was this individual the head of state at the time of the crime?
Was the accused suspected of being a member of, or supporting, a transnational terror group?
gender attentive charges: rape, sexual violence (other than rape), and/or other gender-attentive charges
other relevant information about the trial
How much certainty did coders have in coding this accused?
the last relevant date in the case events table for determining the final outcome of a prosecution for a given accused individual
TJET database version: date on which data was extracted from the database
